context.p: To merge cells located in the same row into a single cell, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Select the cells that you want to merge.
step.info: Select two or more cells that you want to merge in the Editing Window or ContentMap.

choices.choice: Click the Merge Selected Cells button on the toolbar.

task.title: Merging a Cell with the Cell Above/Below

context.p: To merge a cell with the cell above/below, take the following steps:

step.cmd: Place the cursor in a cell that you want to merge.
Merge the cell with the cell above/below.

choices.choice: Choose Table Merge With Cell Above/With Cell Below .
Click the Merge Cell Above/Merge Cell Below button on the toolbar.
